wasundara aga bisawage hithawath sewikawa wuwaya.kumaru nidiyana bawa dutu wasundara eyin mathwuye bisawa aya amatha katha kala heyini.bisawage kanassalu swarupaya wasundarata watahina."kumaraya nidi.bisawa eya kanakata nogath waga wataha gath wasundara ayage sitha wenathakata yomu karannata thath kalaya.'kanassalu wiya yuthu natha dewiya.yuddhayen rajathuma jaya labana wagata sangharaja himiyan anawakiyak kiya thibenawa."'yuda anawakiyata amatharawa sangharaja thawath bohode kiya thibenawa"bisawa wasundarata pawasuwe kopaya musu swarayeni.'sangharaja nayaka hamuduruwo?"wasundara withalaya.bisawa mohothak nihandawa sitiyaya.bisawage wadan yali hara awussannata wasundara thath nokalaya.'wasundara purohitha bamunata mehi enna kiyawa'wasundara nagi sitiyaya.aya ekwarama bisawa wethata nambauru wuwaya.'me siri yahan gabata da dewiya?'aya asuwe saka hara dana gannata meni.me yahan gabata rajuta hara wenath kisima pirimiyekuta athulu wannata awasara nathi waga wasundarata sihipath wuwaya.eya siyathin gela sinda gannawa wani waradaki.bisawa eya nodannawa nowe.'purohithata siri yahan gabata ennata awasara natha dewiya"wasundara bisawata sihipath karannata thath kalaya.
